description: In 1996, the Internet changed the way we connect forever. In 2026, Web3 does it again. Join us for a night of pure connection, stripping away the noise and returning to what matters: authentic human interaction in the digital age. Powered by UXLINK & MEET48 & ScalingX & OLAXBT The organizers reserve the final right of decision on all arrangements, including admission capacity and eligibility.
